scripts.backend: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "[Console]::OutputEncoding = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8; [Console]::InputEncoding = [System.Text.Encoding]::UTF8; Set-Location ..\backend; $env:PORT=5000; $env:PYTHONIOENCODING='utf-8'; $env:PYTHONUTF8='1'; if (Test-Path .\.venv\Scripts\python.exe) { .\.venv\Scripts\python.exe .\run.py } elseif (Get-Command py -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue) { py -3 .\run.py } else { python .\run.py }"
